content.rendered:
Standard Model Sheet

Model Answer Papers solved by the subject teacher will be stuck on the notice board to search out the
difficulties faced by the students
while writing their answers.

Assistant Teacher
Apart from the main subject teacher, a team of assistance is always available to solve student’s difficulties in the subject
Recorded Video Library

Special Video Library made by Pyramid faculties gives you access to JEE, NEET and Other Competitive Entrance exams video lectures. These video library is a value added service for students whenever they face doubts & difficulties.

PYRAMID - Success Pattern

Study Material, Tests and Exams Papers are constructed by expert and experienced faculties and Pyramid yearlong strategy is systematic and proved to be the guarantee of getting selections in different competitive exams.

May I Help You

Exam Line: Special Telephonic / App based help line for the students appearing in SSC & HSC and Entrance Exam during final examination.

Academic Counseling
Examination performance requires constant feedback. We facilitate student with academic counseling and we’ve been reaping excellent results.
SMS System
Reporting absenteeism, class schedule, progress and other programs to keep informed about their child.
